/* Sahil Prakash */

#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<climits>

using namespace std;

#define ull unsigned long long
#define scint(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define scull(x) scanf("%llu",&x)
#define scch(x) scanf("%c",&x)
#define scstr(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b) ? (a) : (b))
#define mod(a) (a)>0 ? (a) : (-1*(a)) 

int main()
{
    int n,k,i,j;
    ull sum;
    scint(n);
    for(i=0;i<n;++i)
    {
	sum=0;
	scint(k);
	int kids[k],pencils[k];
	for(j=0;j<k;++j)
	    scint(kids[j]);
	for(j=0;j<k;++j)
	    scint(pencils[j]);
	sort(kids,kids+k);
	sort(pencils,pencils+k);
	for(j=0;j<k;++j)
	{
	    sum+=mod(kids[j]-pencils[j]);
	}
	cout<<"Case "<<i+1<<": "<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
